text: Michael Christopher "Mike" Starr (April 4, 1966 â€“ March 8, 2011) was an American musician. He is best known as the playing bass guitar in Alice in Chains. Starr was an original member of Alice in Chains since they were formed in 1987. Starr left Alice in Chains in 1993 which lead singer Layne Staley said to be "just a difference in priorities. We wanted to continue intense touring and press, Mike was ready to go home.". Starr appeared on the VH1 television series Celebrity Rehab with Dr. Drew in 2010. Police found Starr dead on March 8, 2011. Dr. Drew said that Starr's death was caused from "a prescription-drug overdose." ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2011 deaths Category:American rock musicians Category:Bassists Category:Drug- related deaths Category:Musicians from Hawaii Category:People from Honolulu Category:Alice in Chains members
title: Mike Starr (musician)
